question: Which one of the following countries has replaced Italy as the major importer of bauxite from India?
explanation: Canada is the largest importer of bauxite from India. India fulfills its bauxite import requirements by importing from 19 countries. Major trading partners for import of bauxite in India are Brazil(59.34 USD Million) , Guinea(58.37 USD Million) , China(21.37 USD Million) , Trinidad and Tobago(21.15 USD Million) , Ghana(11.3 USD Million) .
